about: Experienced full-stack developer with 2 years of expertise in React, Express.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Currently focused on React development, enthusiastic about innovative projects, and passionate about continuous research and development.
aboutSecond: In my free time, I immerse myself in tech blogs, constantly learning and staying updated on the latest technologies. As an avid bike and fitness enthusiast, I relish daily workouts and bike rides. Additionally, I find joy in unwinding with video games during moments of leisure.
